text: I recently purchased and installed ripple-fold day curtains with a track from J&S Design, and I am very pleased with their service. They offer a wide selection of high-quality materials, and their showroom is incredibly helpful for visualizing your options. Most importantly, Lilian listens carefully to your needs and provides options that fit your budget. Overall, it was a great experience, and I highly recommend them!

We had engaged J&S Design for curtains & blind installation recently.. had an excellent experience. Our consultant, Nikki, was fantastic very friendly, patient and helpful. She truly understood our needs and provided so damn good suggestions.
The installation was seamless, and the after-sales service has been superb. We're extremely satisfied with both the products and the service.
